name: Color Balls (itch) (Aura Studios)
description:
Color Balls - Oculus Quest

In this indie shooter-puzzle VR game.  you have to shoot the color balls to their matching color targets. Looks easy? Well... it's not!

Multiple levels

Play through 4 stages with 40 unique and challenging levels, each with different shaped and colored targets, obstacles, moving elements and more. 

Play special levels will targets around you in 360 degrees.

Accuracy and Speed

Test your accuracy, precision and speed by anticipating the targets movements, surpass obstacles and shooting the balls with different force. Take advantage of 6DoF to hit the targets with your best shoot.

"Easy to learn. Hard to master!"

Against the clock

One minute per session to beat your personal highest core and collect star awards to advance to further stages. Collect all 120 stars to beat the game (if you can)!

No. We did not make it easy for you. 

--

Thank you so much for checking this on out. 

Enjoy Color Balls!
